org.silex.core.config.Config

type
class
this structure is used to store config data for Silex it is a static class, so you can access it with Config without creating a new instance.

Static Variables

configData : ConfigData

current configuration object

Static Methods

addConfigValues(stringObject : Dynamic<String>) : Void

parameters
stringObject the object with config data as key/values pairs
load a String object convert the String object with key/values pairs to typed config values merge the config data into configData

duplicateConfigData(configData : { scaleMode : ScaleModeValue, runtime : RuntimeValue, publicationId : String}) : ConfigData

returns a duplicated instance of the config data

getConfigData() : ConfigData

retrieve the configData object

getConfigDataAsUntyped() : Dynamic<String>

returns the config data as an object of String, useful to store the config

setConfigData(newConfigData : ConfigData) : Void

replace the configData object
